Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Longmao Data, is a professional AI data service provider. The company specializes in offering high-quality data services, including data annotation and collection across various modalities such as images, videos, audio, text, point clouds, and multi-modal data. Longmao Data has executed over 5,000 projects in these domains.

Longmao Data has established multiple operational and plans to expand. The company provides a range of services, including an open annotation platform, open-source datasets, customized data services, and business process outsourcing (BPO) services. Their open-source datasets cover various categories such as text, speech, images, videos, and point clouds, aiming to promote data sharing and technological innovation.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Consists of large-scale AI training datasets across multiple modalities, including
- Image Data: Primarily in PNG format  
- Video Data: In MP4 and MOV formats
- Other Data: Includes Speech Data in WAV format, multilingual Text Data, and high-precision 3D LiDAR Point Cloud Data for robotics and autonomous navigation
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: The data is first imported to a local node to generate a CID, then a storage deal is initiated. The data is split, encoded, and replicated before being sealed into sectors. Miners perform pre-commit, sealing, and commit operations to secure the data and periodically submit proof-of-storage. When retrieval is needed, users access the decoded data from miners using the CID.
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Venus built-in data transfer, IPFS, HTTP or FTP server
